Table.Result: A cairn of different sized skulls has been heaped up
A cloud on the horizon rapidly approaches and appears to be a swarm of large insects as it approaches
A cloudburst briefly drenches the desert and small flowers rapidly grow up through the sand
A crooked and skeletal tower made from metal struts rises out of the desert
A depression marks what used to be a lake once, now surrounded by dead vegetation
A dune appears to have an unusually regular shape
A goat grazing on some nearby shrubs suddenly vanishes, as something erupts from the ground and grabs it before disappearing again
A huge crater, several miles across, blocks the way
A huge plume of dust is on the horizon
A large, spider-like shape can be seen in the distance, moving with a jerky, mechanical looking motion
A large, winding depression in the desert marks the remains of a now dried-up river
A pit with collapsing sides has been dug into the desert
A settlement made from bits and pieces of salvaged pre-apocalypse materials has been destroyed by something large passing through it
A single, mostly intact skyscraper rises out of the desert
A small dust devil spins into view and keeps pace, seeming to be behaving intelligently and adjusting course as you do
A small oasis contains a pool of clear water, but this is surrounded by dead plants and animals
A tentacle lashes out of the sand and snatches a bird out of the air above it, dragging it below the surface
A vortex of wind, like a dust devil but much larger, rises out of the desert
A village, still largely intact, is almost completely buried by the sand, forming a small hillock that is noticeable from some distance
A wadi wends across the desert, clearly once a river bed but it doesn't appear to have contained water in some time
An expanse of cracked tarmac, now mostly covered in sand
An oasis looks to be the only source of water for some distance
An oddly-regular dune proves to have covered the subtly arched metal roof of a large building
Bits and pieces of wood and metal stick out of the sand, the remains of a caravan that, if excavated, appears to have been recently swallowed up by the sand
Bolts of what looks like lightning strike down in sequence, though the sky is without cloud and the lightning appears to be striking the same spot
Bricks and concrete blocks have been arranged into what appears to be a crude temple
Broken eggshells litter the sand
Broken glass jars have been heaped into a pile
Buried in the sand are a number of old war machines, all badly damaged and partially melted
By the bank of a concrete channel stands a worn concrete building
Charred, partially melted lines have been cut in the sand in regular rows, where the desert has been subjected to intense, focused heat
Concrete rises out of the ground, the remains, judging by bollards and posts on it, of a dock, though there is no water around
Cracked concrete surrounds a circular opening in the desert
Damaged vehicles have been pulled into a ring and bits and pieces of metal used to fortify the gaps
Detritus and sand has drifted against the sides of a convoy of abandoned military vehicles
Flames are rising out of the desert from what looks like a pool of liquid
Fragments of flesh and bone can be found in a wide area, coming from several different creatures
Fulgurites can be found in the sand, where lightning has struck, only the fulgurites are enormous, several feet across, far larger than could be done by lightning
Glints of light can be seen from some distance away, pieces of metal sticking out of the desert that are reflecting the sun
Grazing on some desert shrubs is a camel when suddenly a nearby dune lurches forwards and completely covers the animal
Humps and grooves in the desert mark the remains of a lost village
In the near distance, the sand is moving in a straight line as something is clearly moving beneath the surface
Just under the surface of the sand are a host of mummified corpses, once buried deeper but now partially exposed where the sand has blown away
Leaning out of the sand is an old sign that has been worn away by sandstorms so that it can no longer be read
Light flickers from the top of a sand dune
Meat-eating wormlike creatures live in the sand here and will attack any living creature that spends too much time on one spot
Melted and now rusty metal sticks out of the sand, surrounded by destroyed buildings and slumped metal storage tanks
Meteorites fall from the sky and hit the desert with a rumble in the near distance
Nestled in the desert is a lush valley full of flora and fauna
Nomads wearing bits and pieces of old protective clothing are leading some camels across the desert
Now mostly buried by drifting sand is a complex of buildings that once was a hotel
Occasionally, the sand moves as something burrows beneath it
On the horizon can be seen a large shape that is moving steadily away from you
One of the sand dunes in the near distance appears to be moving slowly but steadily
Part of the desert is blocked off behind a curving stone wall with a broken centre, the ruined remains of a dam
Pieces of metal tube are partially buried in the desert, with other bits and pieces of broken metal scattered around
Plants surround an oasis which offers the only water for some distance
Pools of black liquid rest on the surface
Ragged tents and damaged tent poles are partially buried in the sand
Rain briefly falls from the sky as clouds rapidly appear then dissipate
Regularly spaced stone structures, roughly rectangular in cross section but with rounded ends, rise out of the desert
Resting on its side is an old, and now badly damaged, tanker vessel
Rising out of the sand is a black stone pillar bearing strange carvings
Running across the desert, and sometimes disappearing below its surface, is a large metal pipe, several feet in diameter
Running across the desert are two parallel lines of metal
Sand is rising in the air and hanging motionless for several minutes before falling back down
Scarabs are lying on the ground
Scavenger birds circle in the air in the distance, settling down to the ground
Scraggly shrubs are growing in the desert
Shaped stones stick out of the sand
Shipping crates are partially buried in the sand
Shrubs with blood-red veins running through their branches grow in a patch
Skeletons of many animals, most looking to be domestic herd animals, are partially covered by a sand dune
Small holes riddle the surrounding desert and occasionally a glimpse of movement can be seen as something that looks like a tentacle lashes out from them
Small scorpions suddenly erupt out of the sand as they detect movement
Small sparks of light mark where pieces of metal are in the sand
Sticking out of the sand are what appear to be the ribs of an immense beast
Stretching across the desert are the remains of a road
Stubs of destroyed skyscrapers rise out of the sand, bearing the marks of intense heat and explosions
The desert here is extremely dry and anyone venturing into it feels the moisture being sucked right out of them

The end of a large metal cylinder sticks out of the sand
The end of a shipping container pokes out of a sand dune, the doors open

The remains of a limestone outcropping sticks out of the desert
The sand has collapsed into a hole, at the bottom of which is a tunnel on which there are metal tracks
The sand is in constant movement, continually forming shapes of various things, including anything living that draws near
The sand is moving and a large lizard that is scuttling across it is suddenly swallowed up
The sand starts to slide and open out into a hole
The temperature of this part of the desert is extremely high, even during the night, and moving through it is difficult and dangerous
There is a dark cloud on the horizon that doesn't seem to move
Tied to a dead-looking shrub is the skeleton of a long-dead camel
Tracks have been left in the sand by something very large with claws
Travelling at speed across the desert is a raised berm of sand, seemingly caused by something moving rapidly just below the surface
Two parallel lines of dead trees are partially buried in the sand
Water flows from a stack of rocks before soaking away into the ground
What look like camels are travelling in the near distance, though they all appear to be oddly shaped
What were once ancient monuments have now been shattered, scattering sandstone blocks across the landscape
Wire fences surround a large area of land, though the fences are damaged, broken and, in some places, melted
A bird hobbles along the path, with an apparently broken wing
A bird swoops down to grab a mouse from the forest floor, but is grabbed by a tentacle that unwraps from the mouse's back and dragged down, where the mouse rips it apart
A branch falls from a tree and it looks as if the tree it fell from was deliberately trying to hit someone with the branch
A buzzing noise can be heard from some distance away
A clearing in the woods is unusually regularly shaped, flat and level and the grass is thin and sickly is places
A copse of trees that look as if they are apple trees bearing fruit
A crack cuts through the ground, several feet wide
A crash can be heard as a tree suddenly falls
A hedgehog walks across the path, its spines clearly metallic in nature
A hill rises up out of the forest, one that seems strangely regular in shape
A huge pit has been dug into the forest floor, and it looks to be almost completely filled with bones
A huge spiderweb stretches between two trees, sparkling when it catches the light
A large beetle, several inches long, walks slowly across the trail
A large ground vehicle has been swallowed up by the forest
A log is covered in huge fungi
A low-lying concrete structure has yet to be colonised by any of the forest plants
A nauseatingly strong stench can suddenly be smelled, making it difficult to breathe
A pile of dung from something large sits on the trail
A pit will open in the ground when creatures walk on top of it
A pool of seemingly clean and clear water is surrounded by dead vegetation and several animal skeletons
A skeleton is wrapped in poison oak
A snake ripples across the path in a strangely mechanical manner
A squirrel runs up the trunk of a tree and into an opening, followed by crunching sounds and blood drips out of the hole

A tree creaks as the vines that are wrapped around it visibly tighten
A tree root curls across the trail
A tree suddenly flickers out of existence, before appearing once more, then becomes transparent
All the trees here look dead, lacking leaves and with brittle branches, yet they somehow also seem to be alive
Amongst the rest of the trees, some growing in two parallel lines can be made out with a clearer patch between them
An animal runs across the trail ahead
An apparent tree stump lashes out with tentacles if approached too closely, attempting to drag creatures into a gaping maw that opens up in its side
An old campfire sits in a small clearing, surrounded by a ring of stones
Birds perch on the nearby branches
Bits and pieces of old, once-manufactured debris, have been arranged into an arrow
Blue-glowing moss adheres to the trunks of nearby trees
Brambles bear vile-looking green fruit
Branches have been arranged in what used to be a hide, though it has been partially destroyed
Bright flowers grow on the forest floor in a patch of sunlight
Bulbous growths are growing on the trunks of some of the trees, seemingly siphoning life out of the trees to which they are attached
Clouds of midges hang beneath the trees
Croaking noises can be traced back to a pond where a number of brightly, and differently, coloured frogs can be found
Crossing the trail ahead is a column of what initially appear to be ants, but which have exoskeletons that look metallic
Dead animals and birds have been strung up from the trees
Dead leaves lie on the forest floor, rapidly decomposing and rotting away as they are watched
Denser patches of trees border lighter ones, with the lighter patches seeming to form several paths, each dozens of yards wide and linked to each other
Every plant in this area, from trees to shrubs to vines, is growing tightly together, even growing into each other in places
Fruit trees are growing in this part of the forest, in what looks like it might once have been an orchard
Holes have been cut into the ground
Huge bitemarks have been taken out of several trees in the area, in some cases cutting halfway through the trunks
In a bank of soil is a large hole, several feet in diameter
Ivy grows up rectangular constructions that are now mostly hidden by the overgrowth
Ivy has wrapped itself around all the nearby trees
Large, clawed tracks cross the path, showing where several large creatures have recently passed

Looming over a rotting corpse is a plant about 8' tall
Lumps rise out of the forest, all strangely regular in shape and spaced apart from each other
Lying on the ground is the remains of a very large nest, surrounded by broken fragments of equally large shells

Moss is draped around the trunks of dead and dying trees

Nearly transparent butterflies dance in a beam of sunlight
Nettles guard the path on both sides, their leaves blocking part of it
Nuts patter down from the trees above

Part of the forest has been burnt, with old ash and stumps littering the ground
Poking through the surface is a small piece of metal, the trigger mechanism of an old, but still functional, mine
Popping noises are heard as seed pods on a nearby plant explode
Puddles of liquid dot the ground
Pulsing green puffballs explode with force if they are touched or disturbed in any way

Standing next to the path is what looks like a sign bearing a map of the area, though it is heavily worn and the few pieces that can be made out do not appear to be accurate

Symbols have been carved into the trunks of a number of trees
The deafening roar of something huge is heard briefly in the distance

The plants have pulsing veins running through them, nearly blood red in colour

The trees look strangely metallic in composition
The trees here move almost imperceptibly when they are not being watched, blocking off paths and subtly diverting travellers

The woods are broken up by a circular clearing, in which nothing lives

Trees and other vegetation have been reduced to pulp by the passage of something very large and heavy

Vines are growing in a strangely regular manner, in what appears to be straight lines

Vines twitch when living creatures approach and will lash out to entangle them when the creatures get close enough
When stepped on, a patch of ground gives off a metallic sound

Lamps on the top of metal poles glow during the night

On a distant slope are several, presumably very large, humanoid figures

On the top of the mountain's peak is a large building with a niche in one side

Spindly metal towers have been built on the mountain
Spoil heaps stand next to a tunnel carved into the rock

Steps have been cut into the mountainside, with broken stumps showing where metal railings used to be fixed

Sticking partway out of the side of the mountain is a huge machine with a drill at one end
Stretching part of the way across a chasm is a damaged bridge

The mountain's rock is gradually moving as it is watched, slowly changing shape

The rock of the mountain is damaged and crumbling where a waterfall has sprayed

The sun briefly disappears as the shadow of something very large passes over, heading towards another peak

Thick, tall metal doors block what looks like an entrance into the mountain

What looks like it was once a road has been damaged by a rockfall

A broken metal door is sent into the ground at a slant

A copse of trees is growing wild, but it looks like they were maintained at one point

A huge pit has been cut into the ground here
A jet of flame rises from a hole in the ground, easily visible from distance away during the day and even further at night
A landing strip extends for hundreds of yards

A large crater contains a pool of foul-looking water in the bottom
A large expanse of water is a lake, but a dead one judging by the smell
A large pumping machine, now juddering and squealing with age and lack of maintenance, is still seemingly attempting to pump oil from the ground, judging by the debris near it
A large trench has been cut in the ground here, going dozens of feet deep
A length of oddly intact road, lined on each side by lampposts that come on at twilight, stretches through the plain for about a mile, before abruptly terminating

A lump of rusty metal sticks up out of the ground
A number of what were once large buildings rise up out of the plains here

A pool of water has a regular shape from a distance, and when approached it can be seen to be artificial
A river cuts through the plains, the water hissing and bubbling as it does

A scarecrow stands in a field of maintained crops, and several other fields can be seen, also with scarecrows

A small spring bubbles out of the ground here, the water quickly soaking away into the ground

A steep-sided crevasse several feet wide cuts through the plain here
An array of metal structures has slumped under exposure to heat
An extensive field of ash stretches for miles, everything, right down to the soil, having been burnt away
An immense crater, several miles across, breaks the plain here

Bits and pieces of roads can be seen poking through the undergrowth, the surface clearly shattered and broken
Broken cylinders of metal, some with seats inside, lie slumped and shattered across the ground

Dead trees rise from the plains, each no more than a charcoal skeleton of what it used to be
Dozens of vehicles have been dumped in a section of the plains, apparently towed there from somewhere else
Dust covers the ground, swirling up every now and then in a breeze

Grassy mounds rise up from the plains, each with an oddly regular shape and positioning
Here and there parts of buildings rise above the plains

In the distance, smoke covers a large expanse of the horizon, boiling up unto the sky in thick, black clouds

Light glints from something on a rise in the distance

Mounds of soil dot the plain, reminiscent of ant mounds, though much larger

Plants are growing from the plains, but they are all twisted and warped
Poking up through the ground are the corners of what appear to be large metal boxes
Protruding from the earth are a number of small metal cylinders, some with conical caps on top of them

Regularly-spaced dots, each metallic and a few inches across, have been driven into the ground

Rising out of the plains is a strangely regular lump, too small to be a true hill
Rubble, presumably the remains of one or more buildings, is scattered across a wide area
Scattered pieces of coloured fabric and lean-tos improvised from flat pieces of now crumbling metal and plastic mark what appears to be an old refugee camp

Shattered pillars of concrete rise above the plain, stretching for a few hundred yards before coming to an end
Skeletons of what look like cows are standing in a nearby field

Small holes dot the ground and every so often something like a prairie dog pokes its head up to take a look

Strange barks can be heard coming closer, and a pack of doglike creatures, all of them deformed in some way, crests a rise

The corner of something a faded red in colour sticks out of the ground

The grass here is thin and sickly-looking, as if it isn't getting enough nourishment

The ground has been fused into a sheet of many different substances

The ground is covered in a layer of fungus, with nothing else growing there
The ground is thickly covered in craters, some overlapping each other but all looking to be about the same size
The ground rings hollow and metallic when walked on, and cleaning away the dirt reveals a trapdoor made of metal

The plain is marred by a sinkhole here, whose steep sides slope down to a hole in what looks like a thick sheet of reinforced concrete
The remains of shattered and destroyed buildings stretches into the distance for miles
The soil and grass has been churned up by the passage of something with massive treads
The sky darkens as a vast cloud of birds flies past above, covering the ground in mildly caustic droppings

Thunder is heard in the distance and its origin is quickly seen, as a herd of beasts charges across the landscape

Twisted skeletal structures of metal stretch in a single line across the landscape

Wild crops are moving in a nearby field
Winding through the plains is a dry river
Yellowish-white things can be seen poking up through the grass
A bucket that used to contain water and fish has been overturned and lies in a large pool of blood that is still spreading out
A channel has been ploughed through the swamp, one that is still raw and fresh, though it has filled with water
A completely regular circular pool is filled with a thick black liquid, that clings to anything it touches and burns bare flesh
A copse of trees in the swamp have a regular appearance to them, suggesting that they were once maintained, but have since grown wild
A crooked steeple rises partly out of the swamp
A flame burns on the surface of a pool, though it can be extinguished
A hillock rising out of the swamp is the only dry land for some distance around, but every inch of it is covered in trees
A huge metal ship has been broken apart and has sunk into the swamp
A humming sound, reminiscent of insects but also sounding slightly mechanical in nature, comes from the distance
A jumble of boats, all generally small in size, rises up from a pool of water and the surrounding shore
A large expanse of water and mud covers the ground in front of the shattered remains of what used to be a dam
A low bridge of pre-apocalyptic construction stretches across part of the swamp, though it is missing several sections
A patch of mist hovers above a nearby pool
A pool of pale green water is surrounded by various twisted looking plants, with strange water lilies growing in the water itself
A pool of water in the swamp is steadily bubbling away and steam is rising from it
A pool of water is filled with leeches which will latch onto anything that enters
A pool of water that appears to be perfectly round in shape if investigated proves to be very deep and the top of an open concrete cylinder
A slope covered in weeds, muck and algae rises gently up out of the swamp before terminating abruptly
A thick rime of salt surrounds one of the marshy pools, and the water within the pool itself is extremely salty, far saltier than seawater, even though the rest of the swamp is freshwater
A warped metal framework, with what looks like a ladder on the interior, leans at an angle out of the swamp
A well-kept hut made from bits and pieces of salvaged pre-apocalyptic materials stands in one of the few comparatively dry areas
A willow tree covered in blackened bark that is split in places
An enormous Venus flytrap is growing out of the swamp
Bits and pieces of assorted junk float on the top of a large, stagnant pool
Bits and pieces of broken roadway lead to a tunnel mouth that heads into the ground
Bits of a large snake are scattered across the path, where something has shredded it
Branches of nearby plants are moving and the ripples cover the surface of a nearby pool, as if they are being acted on by the wind, but there is no wind
Bright red berries grow on bushes in a marshy area
Bubbles of foul-smelling and flammable gas rise up out of the swampy mire, popping with a nauseating stench
Clouds of small biting insects fill the air above various ponds here
Comparatively fresh human corpses lie on the ground, though they also appear to be slowly dissolving into it
Creaking noises come from a nearby tree
Cylindrical pieces of metal, as well as smaller fragments, fill a lot of a pool of water
Draped in algae and moss is something that clearly looks artificial in nature
Driven into the mud by some sort of immense weight are the flattened remains of several bodies, human by the looks of it
During the day, the vegetation in this area appears twisted and deformed
Fragments of broken stone cover the ground, pushed up in places where plants have grown and swallowed up by the muck in others
Fungi grow profusely on every surface
Hanging from the trees are small fetishes made from what look like human fingerbones as well as fragments of pre-apocalyptic items
Herbs are growing in a swampy patch of ground
Holes have been dug into the muck and, though most have filled up with water, metal can be glimpsed at the bottom of many of them
Huge bones that appear to have a metallic cast to them curve up out of one of the pools of water
In a stagnant pool of blackened and foul-melling water float several rusty meatal barrels
In the near distance, a figure enshrouded in a hooded cloak quickly moves away, though with an uneven gait
Lumps covered in algae and moss stick out of the mud and swampy water
Metal wires are partially covered by moss, algae and the swamp itself
Moss, algae and vines cover oddshaped lumps that rise out of the swamp
Moss covers the ground here but, if it's watched for a period of time, the moss proves to be moving, gradually inching its way across the soil, leaving a steaming trail behind it
Moss, of a bright, virulent green hue, covers the ground in a thick layer
Much of the ground here has turned into thick black mud
Oddments of structures poke up out of the swamp, covering a wide area
Part of the swamp has collapsed here, into what looks like a metal and concrete structure
Partially submerged in the swamp is a metal construction that looks like it once strode around on legs, but has collapsed into the mud
Pieces of regularly-shaped metal protrude out of the swamp
Pillars of metal jut up out of the swamp
Protruding up out of the muck are the remains of enormous buildings
Reeds growing out of the swampy waters are a bright red in colour
Regularly-shaped mounds, though of different heights, rise out of a stretch of water, each covered in vines and algae
Rising from the muck are a series of very large, thick walls, seemingly without joins
Rising out of the swamp is a small hill of dry earth
Rotting animal corpses surround a pool of crystal-clear water in the swamp
Running through the swamp are the remains of an ancient road
Rusting oddments of iron, along with still intact fragments of other alloys and perishing plastics, choke a small pool of water in the swamp
Scattered across a wide area of the swamp are rocks and stones thickly covered in algae
Several channels wending through the swamp are filled with faster-flowing water and look curiously regular in shape
Several pieces of metal stick out from the surface of the swamp
Sinking into the swamp are the shattered remains of houses, clustered like a village
Skeletons fill a pool of swampy water, and more are scattered on the muddy banks
Snakes fill one of the pools of water in the swamp in absurdly large numbers, twisting and slithering against each other
Some sort of huge drilling has breached the swamp's surface and is now covered in a thick layer of earth and moss
Standing at the top of a small hillock in the swamp is a very old stone building that looks as if it might pre-date the apocalypse by some time
Steam is rising from a patch of swamp
Sticking out of the swamp is what initially looks like an eyestalk, with an eye on the end, but which glints in a metallic manner
Sticking up from a large, semi-solid pool of water are some curiously regular structures
Sticking up out of the swamp is the wreck of a ship
Stones surround what looks like a swamp-filled graveyard
Sun glints off glass that is covered in vegetation
Surrounding a low hillock of drier ground are the remains of a metal fence, once that has been crushed into the ground in places
Tall concrete pillars rise up out of the swamp, stretching for some distance, suggesting that they supported something that was much larger than a bridge
The marshy areas here have what look to be regular sides, though these are now hidden beneath growth and muck
The remains of walls only a couple of feet high jut out of the swamp
The ruins of buildings stick up out of the swamp, most not much more than stumps and smaller ones completely obscured by vines, algae and moss
The stagnant water here forms a large pool that appears artificially shaped
The surface of a nearby pool of water raises up as something large in the water briefly raises itself almost to the surface before submerging again
The swamp here has become dry and dusty
The water and mud in this area of the swamp has bits and pieces of bones from what look like thousands of bodies
Tied up to the bank is a small, flat-bottomed boat suitable for traversing the swamp
Trees here are rapidly dying and collapsing into the swamp
Triangular mounds of earth, each at least 10' high and covered in vegetation, cross the swamp
Trickling down a small hillock into the stagnant water is a small stream of fresh water
Twisted and warped plants grow up through vile-looking water and putrid mud
Twisted and mutated trees are growing around the edge of a pool full of black water
Underneath the mud there seems to be a grid of metal
Underneath the swamp's water and mud here is what feels like a solid surface beneath it
Vegetation has been crushed in a wide path which is now covered in a layer of slime
Water blasts up from a pool in the swamp, reaching at least a couple of dozen feet in height before ceasing
What appear to be wooden cabins sinking into the muck are arranged along the shoreline of a large pool
What look like stepping stones cross part of the swamp here
What looks to be a sinkhole in the swamp, into which water and mud are slowly flowing, proves to lead to a tunnel whose roof has collapsed
Wooden stakes rise out of the swamp, each topped with a skull
